resources.string: Head of CuNow : Prajjwal Dubey is the founder of CuNow.where he oversees all functions of the business including engineering, product and operations. A designer at heart, prajjwal is known for balancing sharp design thinking with thoughtful product strategy to create experiences that bring people together and encourage authentic communication in Chandigarh University

a. Our Platform is the set of APIs, SDKs, tools, plugins, code, technology, content, and services that enables others, including app developers and website operators, to develop functionality, retrieve data from H.I.N.D.U and any other H.I.N.D.U Products, or provide data to us.

Sparsh Kumar, Shivam Rai, Ashutosh Chaubey: The team of CuNow. All we work in a team. We all are four members of strong programmer. We always work in the unity like a strong team. We all are the student of Chandigarh university of 1st year of CSE batch.
